DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics bioequivalence Amlodipine Besylate Tablets 5 mg versus Norvasc 5 mg tablet administer 5 mg tablet healthy volunteer washout period 14 day
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Amlodipine Norvasc Under Fasting FED Conditions Chinese Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The study design Open-Label Randomized , Single-Dose , 2-way Crossover Bioequivalence Study washout period 14 day . During session , subject administer single dose 5mg amlodipine ( one LANDI-Amlodipine Tablet 5mg one Norvasc Tablet 5mg ) fast FED condition .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy adult volunteer 1840 year old , male female . 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 19.0 25.0 kg/m2 , body weight â‰¥ 50 kg male 45 kg female . 3 . No history heart , liver , kidney , gastrointestinal tract disease , nervous system , neural abnormities metabolic abnormality ; No preparation allergy , serious infection injury , etc . 4 . Medically healthy subject clinically normal laboratory profile ECGs . 5 . Subjects must agree take effective contraceptive method prevent pregnancy start screen 3 month last dose administration 6 . Subjects fully inform voluntarily consent participate study . 1 . History allergy hypersensitivity amlodipine 2 . Significant history neurological , cardiovascular , digestive , respiratory , urinary , hematological , dysmetabolism disease ( psychosis ) unfavorable study 3 . History postural hypotension 4 . Blood donation lose 400mL blood within 3 month prior study 5 . Use medication within 2 week study 6 . Volunteer clinical drug study within 3 month prior study 7 . Drug abuse alcohol abuse ( 220ml beer /day > 5 time 2 hour ) 8 . Smoker ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) 9 . A positive result hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antihepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody , syphilis test , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) test 10 . Abnormal chest Xray result clinical significance 11 . Women childbearing potential , pregnant lactate woman . 12 . Other unfavorable factor diagnose investigator .
